basics.name: Austin McConnell
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hi. I'm software developer who has been...  I have a security clearance from the US government. In my personal time, I like to dabble in Kaggle competitions, setting up a raspberry pi media server and private cloud via owncloud.

work.summary: Lockheed Martin is a global aerospace company that is principally engaged in the research, design, development, manufacture, integration, and sustainment of military aircraft.
highlights: Created a multi-threaded and multi-processing agent-based file watcher program in Python for automation of simulation post processing. Multiple pipelines store processed results in a variety of formats and databases
Yougest Study Lead for contract deliverable. Output from the deliverable was used to directly support prpopsal and negotiation of a $1.9B annualized contract.
Designed and implemented simulation excursions to explore the effects of X on key sustainment metrics

Primary modeler in charge of massive 10 year global simulation which included: planned squadron size and flight hours for US and partner countries, planned and actual spare part purchases, engineered and actual failure rates for thousands of parts.

work.position: Subsystems Integrity and Force Life Management Engineer
work.summary: Lockheed Martin is a global aerospace company that is principally engaged in the research, design, development, manufacture, integration, and sustainment of military aircraft.
highlights: Developed standalone software tool using Matlab to parse binary flight data and collect results for team use (~3000 lines of code)
Provided code design and data analysis for 6 part utilization reports
Applied statistical analysis to multiple dataset formats and used goodness-of-fit parameters to determine best curve fit option
Created Access dtatbase and reports to manage limited-life part inspection requirements
Reviewed qualification requirements and test reports for 4 F-35 subsystems

awards.title: Lowy Award
awards.summary: Awarded to top airplane design team for innovation, technical expertise and teamwork.
